description: CLI tool that manages Jira tickets using JQL. Supports transitions, user search, filter management, and work item operations. Used for readiness checks and deployment workflows.
parameters: status: ('Ready for Production' | 'Ready for Stage'), fixVersion: 'YYYY.MM.DD.01', --to: ('Deployed' | 'Stage'), --dryrun: optional
examples: CMD: jiraop transit --query "status IN ('Ready for Production') AND fixVersion = '2025.11.09.01'" --to "Deployed"
